title: [SOLVED] Must be level 5 or higher
body: When I try to make a comment or a post it says I need to be level 5 or higher, My in game account is lvl 30 and im Ranked silver.Is there another level i must do?

replies.body: Nah these boards account just get out of sync if you've never posted or if it's been a long time. Looks like posting this forced a sync between your accounts because I can see you as level 30 right now!
Thanks :) sorry for late reply just checked the posts :)
